inlineContent.text: Thinking more about setting limits on patience, I’m nearing my first guideline. I’m not sure how clear to make it yet or if I should just leave it vague but it has to do with disrespect. I think that’s one area where I don’t need to be patient.
Obviously misunderstandings can happen so I can’t simply always think I’m being disrespected and snap on people. But I should be able to see patterns of disrespect and act upon those.

abstract.text: Some things do not deserve patience.

David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
